name: The Coast
description:
Who would you become if the apocalypse hit?

In the not too distant future,  several atomic bombs of unknown origin detonated on every major city in Australia, blowing mankind into a state of irreversible decay. This event is commonly known as 'The Crash.' Turning the land of the free into a lawless wasteland fraught with thugs, scavengers and predators. But to you, it's home.

Explore five locations in the Sunshine Coast from the Ginger Factory to Australia Zoo.

(The game is still in development and will be regularly updated with new pictures and fixes.)
